May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Again, I love the very focused support role at the lower line here. Celebrity is a power keyword all of a sudden, and what do power keywords need? A dedicated multi-taxi. The non-speedster Halloween Spooktacular pieces really need carrying. He’d make a decent TVA agent for Mobius M Mobius, too, if none other presented itself in a Sealed game.
May 2, 2022
Goop
Just a good cheap tie up taxi piece you can phase around with. Having 3 damage at 30 points mean he can do some damage if he's not dealt with.
